name: Escape of the Appliances
description:
Escape of the Appliances is a top down puzzle game where you switch between controlling Roberto the robot vacuum and Frank the fridge as they make their way through a space station to try and find an escape pod and leave. It's only with the combined force of their 2 different skillsets that make their progression possible, and so must work closely together in order to make their way through the variety of traps and obstacles in their path. 

Controls: 

- Move with WASD 

- Click on a character to control them

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, the theme being "Stronger Together."
